M

m - Variable in class mainForm
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Controller
 
mainForm - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is the programs top level container and contains all the swing elements for interacting with the program along with action listeners and methods to handle these interactions
mainForm() - Constructor for class mainForm
Constructor for mainForm, adds swing elements to the program along with ActionListeners to perform the other methods written as Anonymous Inner Classes.
menuBar - Variable in class mainForm
 
merge(int, int, int) - Method in class mergeSort
merge method, copies the portion of the array to be merged to a temporary array then reassembles the left and right sections in order by comparing the values of each then writing them to the array
MergeCompare() - Method in class mainForm
This method is used for statistically comparing Array size against sorting time, it creates an array of mergeSort objects, an array of threads to run each sorting algorithm and an ArrayList to hold the data.
mergeS - Variable in class drawPanel
 
MergeSort() - Method in class mainForm
This method creates a mergeSort with 275 values in its array for animation purposes, the drawPanel class is passed in but no Array List as the data is not required for analysis.
mergeSort - Class in <Unnamed>
The mergeSort class is is used to implement a Merge Sorting process on an Array of random integers that are automatically generated by the algorithm, the class can be used to either animate the bubble sort process or record the time taken to fully sort a single array.
mergeSort(int, drawPanel, boolean, ArrayList<arrayStore>) - Constructor for class mergeSort
Constructor for mergeSort
MergeSort(int, int) - Method in class mergeSort
MergeSort method, finds the middle value of the array and recursively divides the Array in half until a single value is reached using the array indexes as size boundaries, calls merge method once the dividing is complete to reassemble the divided array in ascending order.
mergeStore - Variable in class mainForm
